lead_paragraph: WOLFF--Raymond A. "Dutch." April 21, 1925 - May 23, 2016. WWII Veteran, musician, Oberlin Conservatory graduate, teacher, dance band leader, husband to Joan. Survived by daughters Margaret and Melora, extended family, and loving friends. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WOLFF, RAYMOND A

snippet: WOLFF--Raymond A. "Dutch." April 21, 1925 - May 23, 2016. WWII Veteran, musician, Oberlin Conservatory graduate, teacher, dance band leader, husband to Joan. Survived by daughters Margaret and Melora, extended family, and loving friends. 1/3
